metadata.Description: Storage systems that store electrical energy in batteries for later use.

level 1.Description: Battery storage implements the Energy Storage Policy to promote the use of energy storage technologies for grid stability and renewable energy integration.
Battery storage funds research and development activities to improve battery technologies and enhance energy storage capabilities.
Battery storage focuses on grid integration to enable the seamless integration of renewable energy sources and enhance grid stability.
Battery storage is used in renewable energy projects to store excess energy generated from renewable sources for later use.
Battery storage partners with electric vehicle manufacturers to develop advanced battery technologies for electric vehicles.
Battery storage contributes to the energy transition by enabling the integration of renewable energy sources and reducing reliance on fossil fuels.
Battery storage monitors battery performance to ensure optimal operation and identify any issues or degradation in performance.
Battery storage targets the increase of energy storage capacity to support the growth of renewable energy and enhance grid flexibility.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage employs battery technologies to store and release energy efficiently, enabling the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid.

level 2.Subject: just energy transition
level 2.Description: The just energy transition employs a renewable energy workforce to support the transition to clean energy sources.

level 2.Subject: just energy transition
level 2.Description: The just energy transition collaborates with local communities to ensure a fair and inclusive transition to sustainable energy.

level 3.Subject: smart metering technologies
level 3.Description: Smart metering technologies implement the Energy Efficiency Policy by providing real-time data on energy consumption.

level 3.Subject: energy tax incentives
level 3.Description: Energy tax incentives are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the adoption of energy-saving practices.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.
